<em>Locating information, people and resources via the Web</em>
<p>The 'Search' competency is made up of the following skills:</p>
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Search/using-keyboard-shortcuts Using keyboard shortcuts to make Web searches more efficient]
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Search/entering-search-operators Entering search operators and keywords to find information efficiently]
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Search/finding-real-time-info Finding real-time or time-sensitive information using a range of search techniques]
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Search/locating-information-within-results Locating or finding desired information within search results]
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Search/synthesizing-info Synthesizing information found from online resources]
